alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ALACHUA...NORTH CENTRAL MARION AND WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cross Creek, or near Citra, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Citra, Hawthorne, Cross Creek, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Micanopy, Reddick, McIntosh, Lochloosa, and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
